function NPC_113160:Init(NPCID) --[[ User Data 1: 대쉬 카운트 2: 대쉬 모팩 누적 3: 대쉬타입 0 일반대쉬 1 노쿨대쉬 4: 대쉬 캔슬 리액션 처리 플래그 5: Pain 데미지 --]]
NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 5);
NPC_113160.MaxCntUserData = 3 NPC_113160.MaxCntSpirit = 3 NPC_113160.MaxCntDash = 3
NPC_113160.BufIdHellFlame = 40140 NPC_113160.MinionIdSkillDummy = 113161
NPC_113160.TalIdDashStart = 211316017 NPC_113160.TalIdDashContinue = 211316020 NPC_113160.TalIdDashEnd = 211316021 NPC_113160.TalIdForcedDashEnd = 211316022
NPC_113160.TalIdFinalDashStart = 211316019 NPC_113160.TalIdFinalDashEnd = 211316023 NPC_113160.TalIdForcedFinalDashEnd = 211316024
NPC_113160.TalIdForcedDashEnd2 = 211316025 NPC_113160.TalIdForcedFinalDashEnd2 = 211316026
NPC_113160.TalIdFieryPath1 = 211316102 NPC_113160.TalIdFieryPath2 = 211316103 NPC_113160.TalIdModeChange2 = 211316025 NPC_113160.TalIdBackAttack = 211316014 NPC_113160.TalIdPain1 = 211316001 NPC_113160.TalIdPain2 = 211316004 NPC_113160.TalIdMarkOfDeath = 211316013
NPC_113160.LimitForDispair = 500 NPC_113160.LimitForBackAttack = 200 NPC_113160.LimitForStopRush = 3300 NPC_113160.LimitForPain = NPC_113160.MaxHP/20 end
function NPC_113160:OnSpawn( Info ) this:GainBuff( NPC_113160.BufIdHellFlame ) end
function NPC_113160:MarkOfDeath( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_113160.TalIdMarkOfDeath ) then return end
local NewEnemy = ThisNPC:Aggro( "near", 0 )
if ThisNPC:DistanceTo( NewEnemy ) > NPC_113160.LimitForDispair then return end
ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_113160.TalIdMarkOfDeath, NewEnemy ) end
function NPC_113160:BackAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_113160.TalIdBackAttack ) then return end
local Dist = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) local IsRear = Enemy:IsRear( ThisNPC )
if Dist < NPC_113160.LimitForBackAttack and IsRear then if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113160.TalIdBackAttack ) end end end
function NPC_113160:OnActFieryPath( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
local SummonPos = vec3() local LocalAdjPos = vec3()
LocalAdjPos = vec3(math.random(0, 0), math.random(0, 0), 0) SummonPos = Math_LocalToWorld( ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), LocalAdjPos ) local SkillDummy = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_113160.MinionIdSkillDummy, SummonPos )
SkillDummy:FaceTo( Enemy ) if math.random(0,1) == 1 then SkillDummy:UseTalent( NPC_113160.TalIdFieryPath1, Enemy ) else SkillDummy:UseTalent( NPC_113160.TalIdFieryPath2, Enemy ) end
SkillDummy:Despawn(false) end
function NPC_113160:OnActCircleOfFire( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
local SkillDummy = AsNPC( ThisNPC:GetTarget() ) SkillDummy:UseTalentSelf( 211316101 ) end
function NPC_113160:OnStartCircleOfFire( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
local SummonPos = vec3() local LocalAdjPos = vec3()
local MaxDist = 800 local MinDist = 300
local xPos = math.random(0, MaxDist) local doubleY = MaxDist*MaxDist-xPos*xPos local yMaxPos = math.sqrt( doubleY ) local yMinPos = 0
if xPos < MinDist then yMinPos = math.sqrt( MinDist*MinDist-xPos*xPos ) end local yPos = math.random( yMinPos, yMaxPos )
--GLog( xPos .. "," .. yPos .. "\n" ) local n = math.random( 0 , 4 )
if n == 0 then xPos = xPos*-1 elseif n == 1 then xPos = xPos*-1 yPos = yPos*-1 elseif n == 2 then yPos = yPos*-1 end
LocalAdjPos = vec3( xPos, yPos, 0) SummonPos = Math_LocalToWorld( ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), LocalAdjPos ) local SkillDummy = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_113160.MinionIdSkillDummy, SummonPos )
SkillDummy:GainBuff( 40143 ) ThisNPC:SetTarget( SkillDummy ) end
function NPC_113160:OnActFieryHoofsStart( ThisActor, Enemy ) --local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) end
-- 화염발굽 시작 function NPC_113160:OnFinishFieryHoofsStart( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
--ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_113160.BufIdHellFlame ) ThisNPC:RemoveAllBuff() ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
function NPC_113160:OnActFieryHoofsEnd( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_113160.BufIdHellFlame ) end
-- 대쉬공격시작을 수행후 모드전환및 대쉬 카운트를 1로 설정한다. function NPC_113160:OnFinishDashStart( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, 1 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, 0 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 )
ThisNPC:RemoveAllBuff() ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
function NPC_113160:OnFinishFinalDashStart( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, 1 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 3, 1 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 0 )
ThisNPC:RemoveAllBuff() ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
function NPC_113160:OnActDashContinue( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_113160.BufIdHellFlame )
-- 블럭 누적치 리셋 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) end
function NPC_113160:OnCancelDashEnd( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_113160.TalIdForcedDashEnd2, Enemy ) end
function NPC_113160:OnCancelFinalDashEnd( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_113160.TalIdForcedFinalDashEnd2, Enemy ) end
-- 이어지는대쉬공격을수행후 횟수를 카운트한다. function NPC_113160:OnFinishDashContinue( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 )+1 )
ThisNPC:RemoveAllBuff() ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) end
function NPC_113160:OnActDashEnd( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_113160.BufIdHellFlame ) end
-- 대쉬카운트를 체크하여 대쉬공격을 계속할지 말지를 결정. function NPC_113160:DashAttack( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local DashCount = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 ) --GLog( "DashCount = " .. DashCount )
ThisNPC:Wait(1) ThisNPC:FaceTo(Enemy)
if DashCount < NPC_113160.MaxCntDash then ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Enemy, NPC_113160.TalIdDashContinue ) ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_113160.TalIdDashContinue, Enemy ) else if ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) == 0 then ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Enemy, NPC_113160.TalIdDashEnd ) ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_113160.TalIdDashEnd, Enemy ) else ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Enemy, NPC_113160.TalIdDashEnd ) ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_113160.TalIdFinalDashEnd, Enemy ) end end end
function NPC_113160:OnBPartRecover() --this:BreakPart( 1, this ) --[[ for i=0, NPC_113160.MaxCntUserData do this:SetUserData( i, 0 ) end --]] end
function NPC_113160:AccDamage( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo )
if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 1 or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_113160.TalIdDashEnd or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_113160.TalIdFinalDashEnd then NPC_113160:AccDamageForStopRush( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) elseif ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 then --NPC_113160:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) end end
function NPC_113160:AccDamageForPain( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) if ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() ~= 0 then return end
local AccDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 )+ HitInfo.Damage if AccDamage > NPC_113160.LimitForPain then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113160.TalIdPain1 ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 5, 0 ) return end
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 5, AccDamage ) end
-- mode1 처리 -- 누적된 deflect weight값을 이용해서 러쉬를 멈출지 말지를 결정한다. function NPC_113160:AccDamageForStopRush( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) if ThisNPC:GetUserData( 4 ) == 1 then return end
local DeflectWeight = HitInfo.MF:Get( MF_DEFLECT ).Weight
if DeflectWeight <= 0 then return end
local Tot = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) + DeflectWeight local Enemy = HitInfo.Attacker
local Tot = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) if ThisNPC:GetLevel()-3 <= Enemy:GetLevel() then Tot = Tot + DeflectWeight else local LevelDiff = ThisNPC:GetLevel()-3 -Enemy:GetLevel() if LevelDiff >= 10 then return end
Tot = Tot + DeflectWeight * ( 1 - 0.05 * LevelDiff ) end
--GLog( "DeflectWeight=" .. DeflectWeight .. ", Tot=" .. Tot ) --if Tot >= 0 then if Tot >= NPC_113160.LimitForStopRush then if ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() ~= NPC_113160.TalIdDashStart and ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() ~= NPC_113160.TalIdFinalDashStart then
ThisNPC:SetUserData( 4, 1 ) ThisNPC:ClearJob()
if ThisNPC:GetUserData( 3 ) == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113160.TalIdForcedDashEnd ) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_113160.TalIdForcedFinalDashEnd ) end end else ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, Tot ) end end
function NPC_113160:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) NPC_113160:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
-- 돌진시작 function NPC_113160:OnHitCapsule_3_0(HitInfo) NPC_113160:AccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
-- 돌진계속 function NPC_113160:OnHitCapsule_4_0(HitInfo) NPC_113160:AccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
-- 돌진종료 function NPC_113160:OnHitCapsule_5_0(HitInfo) NPC_113160:AccDamage( this, 3, HitInfo ) end
